metadata.title: cp_measure benchmarking dataset
metadata.description:
Images, masks and dataframes to replicate the results of a CellProfiler pipeline. This data is intended to be used for evaluating the fidelity of cp_measure features relative to CellProfiler and optimize the former.

Files included:
- `cellprofiler_data.parquet`: CellProfiler feature outputs including object, feature, channel, and values.
- `cpm_cellprofiler_joint.parquet`: Joint dataset comparing cp_measure (`cp_measure` column) and CellProfiler (`CellProfiler` column) results.
- `image_index.parquet`: Index file containing metadata for images (Source, Batch, Plate, Well, Site, etc.).
- `images.tar.gz`: Archive containing the source TIFF images.
- `masks.tar.gz`: Archive containing segmentation masks in NPZ format.
